story_07_09000/2401_1001_0100_10:
How could this be?!
How could I lose to the likes of you?!
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0200_10: Don’t get the wrong idea. This isn’t over!
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: We did it! What a huge win for us!
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hm, it certainly was!
Now I can finally give you your badge.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0500_10:
That’s the Patience Badge. It’s given to Trainers
who have unbending mental strength.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The Patience Badge suits you well. I’m looking
forward to seeing just how far you can go with
your strong mentality.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And one more thing...
Would it be possible for me to join your team?
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I would like to watch the next generation of
Trainers grow from up close.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Huh? Are you really planning to go with
[Name:PlayerNickname ], Dad?
story_07_09000/2401_1001_1000_10: Of course! I, too, want to grow stronger.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That’s my reason for wanting to go. Will you
have me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_07_09000/2401_0401_1300_10:
Mmhmm! Then from now on, let’s devote
ourselves to growing stronger!
story_07_09000/2401_0302_1400_10: I’m excited to learn from you!
story_07_09000/2401_0402_1500_10:
The pleasure is mine.
Let’s devote ourselves to growing stronger!
story_07_09000/2401_1001_1600_10:
All right! I guess I’ve gotta get serious about my
training, too, huh? After all, I do wanna beat
you again, Dad!
story_07_09000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Nice, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Not only did
you get the badge—you got Norman to
acknowledge your skill.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I haven’t forgotten about you, either, Paulo.
Here, take this badge.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_1900_10: What?! But you beat me in our battle...
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Victory isn’t everything.
What’s truly important is your mental fortitude.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2100_10:
You supported [Name:PlayerNickname ] in the
face of fearsome opponents and didn’t back
down. You’ve earned this badge.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I’m going to grow stronger...stronger than
anyone else...
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2400_10: Huh? I didn’t quite catch that.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Nothing. It’s nothing.
Thank you for the badge.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I guess this is where we part ways again,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m off to collect my
next badge.
story_07_09000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Next time you see me, I’ll be stronger than
ever! Strong enough to blow you and Norman
out of the water!
